org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram

Interface ILinkRouteBuilder


  • public interface ILinkRouteBuilder
    Interface to build easily a connection route from scratch.

    Contrary to ILinkRoute this service takes into account the real anchor location to build orthogonal segments.

    Usage sample

    
 IDiagramLink link = ...
 link.buildRoute()
 .setSourceAnchor(LinkAnchorFace.EAST, true)
 .setTargetAnchor(LinkAnchorFace.WEST, true)
 .addHorizontalSegment(200, false)
 .finishVerticalThenHorizontal(false)
 .apply();
    Since:
    5.1.0

    • Method Detail

      • setSourceAnchor

        ILinkRouteBuilder.Target setSourceAnchor(Point loc,
                                         boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection source point at a given location.

        The real anchor location may be different from the requested one.

        Parameters:
        loc - the point location
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.

      • setSourceAnchorFaceTarget

        ILinkRouteBuilder.Target setSourceAnchorFaceTarget(boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection source point on the nearst face toward target node.
        Parameters:
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.

      • setSourceAnchor

        ILinkRouteBuilder.Target setSourceAnchor(LinkAnchorFace face,
                                         int numerator,
                                         int denominator,
                                         boolean sliding)
        Request to anchor the connection source point on at a fraction of a given face.

        Depending on the face the fraction starts on the left or from the top.

        The real anchor location may be different from the requested one.

        Parameters:
        face - the desired false
        numerator - the fraction numerator. 0 means top or left, 'denominator' means bottom or right.
        denominator - the fraction denominator.
        sliding - true to request a sliding anchor, false to request a fixed anchor.
        Returns:
        the route builder to use for next steps.
